section.name: Overview
section.p: Here the user log. Identifies the user when you search in the search screen users the user log in. You can search log and popular URL information and the use. You can disable this feature in the General crawl settings.

subsection.name: How to display
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click menu users.

subsection.name: Users list
subsection.p: Lists the ID of the user. You can select the search logs or popular URL links, to see a list of each log.
